steps: Open the Microsoft Word document called Document11.docx.
Go to the 'Insert' tab in the ribbon.
Click on the 'Page Number' button in the 'Header & Footer' section.
Select the desired location for the page numbers (e.g., top of the page, bottom of the page, etc.).
Choose the preferred page number format from the available options.
If necessary, customize the appearance of the page numbers using the 'Format Page Numbers' option.
Click 'OK' to apply the page numbers to the document.
